metadata.title: CVE-2022-48742 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:rtnetlink: make sure to refresh master_dev/m_ops in __rtnl_newlink()While looking at one unrelated syzbot bug, I found the replay logicin __rtnl_newlink() to potentially trigger use-after-free.It is better to clear master_dev and m_ops inside the loop,in case we have to replay it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
